tool_input.content:
# Oh My OpenCode Agent Configuration - Quick Reference Guide

**Last Updated**: January 11, 2026

---

## üéØ AGENT QUICK LOOKUP

### Agent Name ‚Üí Model ‚Üí Cost ‚Üí Use Case

| Agent | Model | Cost | When to Use |
|-------|-------|------|-------------|
| **Sisyphus** | Opus 4.5 | FREE | Primary orchestrator, all tasks |
| **Oracle** | GPT-5.2 | EXPENSIVE | Architecture, hard debugging, 2+ failed attempts |
| **Librarian** | Sonnet 4.5 | CHEAP | Research, docs, GitHub examples |
| **Explore** | Grok Code | FREE | Find code, patterns, structure |
| **Frontend** | Gemini 3 Pro | EXPENSIVE | UI/UX design, visual components |
| **Document** | Gemini 3 Pro | EXPENSIVE | Technical docs, comments |
| **Multimodal** | Gemini 3 Flash | CHEAP | PDF/image analysis |
| **Metis** | Opus 4.5 | CHEAP | Pre-planning analysis |
| **Momus** | Opus 4.5 | CHEAP | Plan validation |
| **Prometheus** | Opus 4.5 | CHEAP | Task planning |

---

## üîß CONFIGURATION FILE LOCATIONS

```
~/.opencode.json                    # User configuration (highest priority)
~/.claude.json                      # Claude Code IDE config
~/.config/opencode/                 # OpenCode config directory
```

---

## üìù MINIMAL CONFIGURATION EXAMPLES

### Example 1: Override Sisyphus Model

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "Sisyphus": {
      "model": "anthropic/claude-opus-4-5"
    }
  }
}
```

### Example 2: Configure Category

```json
{
  "categories": {
    "quick": {
      "model": "anthropic/claude-opus-4-5",
      "temperature": 0.3
    }
  }
}
```

### Example 3: Enable Extended Thinking

```json
{
  "categories": {
    "ultrabrain": {
      "model": "anthropic/claude-opus-4-5",
      "thinking": {
        "type": "enabled",
        "budgetTokens": 32000
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Example 4: Disable Agent

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "oracle": {
      "disable": true
    }
  }
}
```

### Example 5: Set Permissions

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "explore": {
      "permission": {
        "edit": "deny",
        "bash": "allow",
        "webfetch": "allow"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Example 6: Add Skills

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "Sisyphus": {
      "skills": ["git-master", "playwright"]
    }
  }
}
```

---

## üéØ AGENT SELECTION FLOWCHART

```
‚îå‚îÄ Is it a skill trigger?
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ YES ‚Üí Use skill tool FIRST
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ Is it UI/visual work?
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ YES ‚Üí Use Frontend UI/UX Engineer (Gemini)
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ Is it research/docs?
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ YES ‚Üí Use Librarian (Sonnet)
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ Is it code search?
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ YES ‚Üí Use Explore (Grok Code)
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ Is it architecture/hard debugging?
‚îÇ  ‚îî‚îÄ YES ‚Üí Use Oracle (GPT-5.2)
‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ Everything else
   ‚îî‚îÄ Use Sisyphus (Opus 4.5)
```

---

## üîê PERMISSION LEVELS

```typescript
type Permission = "ask" | "allow" | "deny"

// Available permissions:
// - edit: File editing
// - bash: Shell commands
// - webfetch: Web requests
// - doom_loop: Infinite loop detection
// - external_directory: Access outside project
```

### Permission Example

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "explore": {
      "permission": {
        "edit": "deny",
        "bash": {
          "find": "allow",
          "grep": "allow",
          "cat": "ask"
        },
        "webfetch": "allow"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## üìä BUILT-IN CATEGORIES

| Category | Model | Use Case |
|----------|-------|----------|
| **quick** | Opus 4.5 | Default, all regular tasks |
| **visual** | Gemini 3 Pro | UI/UX design |
| **business-logic** | GPT-5.2 | Complex logic, distributed systems |
| **strategic** | GPT-5.2 | Architecture decisions |
| **ultrabrain** | Opus 4.5 | Extended thinking (32k tokens) |
| **artistry** | Gemini 3 Pro | Creative work |
| **writing** | Gemini 3 Pro | Documentation |

---

## üéõÔ∏è AGENT CONFIGURATION SCHEMA

### Minimal Agent Config

```typescript
{
  model?: string                    // Model identifier
  temperature?: number              // 0.0-2.0
  top_p?: number                    // 0.0-1.0
  prompt?: string                   // Override system prompt
  prompt_append?: string            // Append to prompt
  skills?: string[]                 // Skill names
  tools?: Record<string, boolean>   // Tool restrictions
  disable?: boolean                 // Disable agent
  description?: string              // Agent description
  mode?: "subagent" | "primary" | "all"
  color?: string                    // Hex color (#RRGGBB)
  permission?: {
    edit?: "ask" | "allow" | "deny"
    bash?: "ask" | "allow" | "deny" | Record<string, "ask" | "allow" | "deny">
    webfetch?: "ask" | "allow" | "deny"
    doom_loop?: "ask" | "allow" | "deny"
    external_directory?: "ask" | "allow" | "deny"
  }
}
```

---

## üîÑ MODEL FALLBACK CHAINS

### Explore Agent Fallback

```
1. User override (agents.explore.model)
2. Installer setting (gemini/claude enabled)
3. Default: opencode/grok-code
4. Fallback 1: google/gemini-3-flash
5. Fallback 2: anthropic/claude-haiku-4-5
```

### Librarian Agent Fallback

```
1. User override
2. Default: anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5
3. Fallback: google/gemini-3-flash
```

---

## üöÄ COMMON TASKS

### Task 1: Use Different Model for Sisyphus

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "Sisyphus": {
      "model": "anthropic/claude-opus-4-5"
    }
  }
}
```

### Task 2: Enable Thinking for Complex Tasks

```json
{
  "categories": {
    "ultrabrain": {
      "model": "anthropic/claude-opus-4-5",
      "thinking": {
        "type": "enabled",
        "budgetTokens": 32000
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Task 3: Restrict Agent Permissions

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "explore": {
      "permission": {
        "edit": "deny",
        "bash": "allow"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Task 4: Add Skills to Agent

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "Sisyphus": {
      "skills": ["git-master", "playwright", "frontend-ui-ux"]
    }
  }
}
```

### Task 5: Disable Expensive Agent

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "oracle": {
      "disable": true
    }
  }
}
```

---

## üìã AGENT METADATA FIELDS

```typescript
interface AgentPromptMetadata {
  category: "exploration" | "specialist" | "advisor" | "utility"
  cost: "FREE" | "CHEAP" | "EXPENSIVE"
  triggers: Array<{
    domain: string
    trigger: string
  }>
  useWhen?: string[]
  avoidWhen?: string[]
  dedicatedSection?: string
  promptAlias?: string
  keyTrigger?: string
}
```

---

## üéì AGENT CATEGORIES

### Exploration
- **Explore**: Find code, patterns, structure
- **Librarian**: Research, documentation

### Specialist
- **Frontend UI/UX Engineer**: Visual design
- **Document Writer**: Technical docs
- **Multimodal Looker**: PDF/image analysis

### Advisor
- **Oracle**: Architecture, hard debugging
- **Metis**: Pre-planning analysis
- **Momus**: Plan validation

### Utility
- **Sisyphus**: Orchestration
- **Prometheus**: Planning

---

## üîç SCHEMA VALIDATION

All configurations are validated against:

```
File: src/config/schema.ts
Type: OhMyOpenCodeConfigSchema (Zod)

Validates:
- agents: AgentOverridesSchema
- categories: CategoriesConfigSchema
- skills: SkillsConfigSchema
- experimental: ExperimentalConfigSchema
- And 10+ other top-level configs
```

---

## üìö CONFIGURATION HIERARCHY

```
1. User Config (~/.opencode.json)
   ‚Üì (overrides)
2. Installer Settings
   ‚Üì (overrides)
3. Default Configuration
   ‚Üì (overrides)
4. Fallback Models
```

---

## üéØ DECISION TREE: WHICH AGENT?

```
START
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ Skill match? ‚Üí Use skill tool
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ UI/visual? ‚Üí Frontend UI/UX Engineer
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ Research/docs? ‚Üí Librarian
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ Code search? ‚Üí Explore
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ Architecture/hard debug? ‚Üí Oracle
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îú‚îÄ Planning? ‚Üí Prometheus/Metis/Momus
  ‚îÇ
  ‚îî‚îÄ Everything else ‚Üí Sisyphus
```

---

## üîß CONFIGURATION VALIDATION

### Check Configuration

```bash
# Validate against schema
cat ~/.opencode.json | jq . > /dev/null

# Or use TypeScript validation
import { OhMyOpenCodeConfigSchema } from "@opencode-ai/oh-my-opencode"
const config = OhMyOpenCodeConfigSchema.parse(userConfig)
```

---

## üìä TEMPERATURE RECOMMENDATIONS

| Agent | Recommended | Range | Use Case |
|-------|-------------|-------|----------|
| **Sisyphus** | 0.1 | 0.0-0.3 | Deterministic, code-focused |
| **Oracle** | 0.1 | 0.0-0.3 | Strategic analysis |
| **Librarian** | 0.1 | 0.0-0.3 | Research, documentation |
| **Explore** | 0.1 | 0.0-0.3 | Code search |
| **Frontend** | 0.7 | 0.5-1.0 | Creative design |
| **Document** | 0.7 | 0.5-1.0 | Creative writing |

---

## üéØ THINKING BUDGET RECOMMENDATIONS

| Task Complexity | Budget | Agent |
|-----------------|--------|-------|
| **Simple** | 0 | Sisyphus (no thinking) |
| **Medium** | 8k-16k | Sisyphus (thinking enabled) |
| **Complex** | 32k | Sisyphus Extended / Oracle |
| **Very Complex** | 32k+ | Oracle (GPT-5.2) |

---

## üö® COMMON MISTAKES

### ‚ùå Mistake 1: Using Oracle for Everything

```json
// DON'T DO THIS
{
  "agents": {
    "Sisyphus": {
      "model": "openai/gpt-5.2"  // Too expensive!
    }
  }
}
```

### ‚úÖ Correct: Use Oracle Only When Needed

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "Sisyphus": {
      "model": "anthropic/claude-opus-4-5"
    }
  }
}
```

### ‚ùå Mistake 2: Disabling All Agents

```json
// DON'T DO THIS
{
  "disabled_agents": [
    "Sisyphus", "oracle", "librarian", "explore"
  ]
}
```

### ‚úÖ Correct: Disable Only Expensive Ones

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "oracle": {
      "disable": true
    }
  }
}
```

---

## üìñ FULL SCHEMA REFERENCE

### Top-Level Configuration

```typescript
interface OhMyOpenCodeConfig {
  $schema?: string
  disabled_mcps?: string[]
  disabled_agents?: BuiltinAgentName[]
  disabled_skills?: BuiltinSkillName[]
  disabled_hooks?: HookName[]
  disabled_commands?: BuiltinCommandName[]
  agents?: AgentOverrides
  categories?: CategoriesConfig
  claude_code?: ClaudeCodeConfig
  google_auth?: boolean
  sisyphus_agent?: SisyphusAgentConfig
  comment_checker?: CommentCheckerConfig
  experimental?: ExperimentalConfig
  auto_update?: boolean
  skills?: SkillsConfig
  ralph_loop?: RalphLoopConfig
  background_task?: BackgroundTaskConfig
  notification?: NotificationConfig
  git_master?: GitMasterConfig
}
```

---

## üîó RELATED FILES

- **Full Documentation**: `OH_MY_OPENCODE_AGENT_CONFIG_SEARCH_RESULTS.md`

- **Type Definitions**: `src/agents/types.ts`

---

## ‚úÖ CHECKLIST: CONFIGURE YOUR AGENTS

- [ ] Identify your primary use case (code, UI, research, etc.)
- [ ] Choose appropriate agent(s) from the lookup table
- [ ] Create/edit `~/.opencode.json`
- [ ] Add agent overrides for your preferred models
- [ ] Set permissions if needed
- [ ] Add skills if required
- [ ] Validate configuration (JSON syntax)
- [ ] Test with a simple task
- [ ] Adjust temperature/thinking as needed

---

```typescript
type Permission = "ask" | "allow" | "deny"

// Available permissions:
// - edit: File editing
// - bash: Shell commands
// - webfetch: Web requests
// - doom_loop: Infinite loop detection
// - external_directory: Access outside project
```

```json
{
  "agents": {
    "explore": {
      "permission": {
        "edit": "deny",
        "bash": {
          "find": "allow",
          "grep": "allow",
          "cat": "ask"
        },
        "webfetch": "allow"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## üîÑ MODEL FALLBACK CHAINS

### Explore Agent Fallback

```
1. User override (agents.explore.model)
2. Installer setting (gemini/claude enabled)
3. Default: opencode/grok-code
4. Fallback 1: google/gemini-3-flash
5. Fallback 2: anthropic/claude-haiku-4-5
```

### Librarian Agent Fallback

```
1. User override
2. Default: anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5
3. Fallback: google/gemini-3-flash
```
